RT by @mmdnry443125612: 💡 Curious about the future of public goods, decentralized science, and climate solutions? Join @FundingCommons  and @EarthCommons  at #FtCBangkok on November 8-9!

🎤🌐 Leo Lin @linyao01 , Founder of Arkreen, will speak on DePIN+ReFi for Climate Change and Public Goods, connecting with leaders in funding and climate solutions. Don't miss it!

👉 Register here: https://lu.ma/ftc-bangkok-2024

#DePIN #ReFi #DeGEN #BKK #FtCBangkok $AKRE

Vote for us and show your support! 🎉 After voting, send us a screenshot, and we’ll randomly select 10 lucky participants daily. Each winner will receive 1 Lite Remote Miner + 0.1 ART 🙌

🗳 Cast your vote now for the 17 SDG Challenge!  https://blockchainforgood.xyz/vote/7

Together, let’s tackle global challenges with blockchain technology! 💪🌱

items.creator: @DioneProtocol
items.title:
RT by @VSaroyan32742: ⚡️Spark partnership announcement:

$AKRE 🤝 $DIONE

☀️ @arkreen_network is the leading DePIN Energy project as one of the largest developers of tokenized renewable energy credits (RECs). With over 100GWh of residential rooftop solar green electricity already tokenzied for on-chain offset and more on the way. Dione’s Odyssey Layer 1, the world’s first 100% clean energy powered layer 1 blockchain via Orion, brings a strategic ecosystem demand for tokenized RECs, Energy Attribute Credits (EACs), and Carbon Credits (CCs).

We envision a world where our Orion validators can be paired with Arkreen's behind-the-meter solar and storage systems. Both projects join forces to scale the clean energy revolution. Join us⚡️

items.contentSnippet:
⚡️Spark partnership announcement:
$AKRE 🤝 $DIONE
@arkreen_network is the leading DePIN Energy project as one of the largest developers of tokenized renewable energy credits (RECs). With over 100GWh of residential rooftop solar green electricity already tokenzied for on-chain offset and more on the way. Dione’s Odyssey Layer 1, the world’s first 100% clean energy powered layer 1 blockchain via Orion, brings a strategic ecosystem demand for tokenized RECs, Energy Attribute Credits (EACs), and Carbon Credits (CCs).

We envision a world where our Orion validators can be paired with Arkreen's behind-the-meter solar and storage systems. Both projects join forces to scale the clean energy revolution. Join us⚡️

RT by @sih32012: 🧵1/ 🚀 Arkreen introduces its latest narrative, redefining carbon assets as public goods in the age of the network state! 🌍✨ By building a decentralized, transparent, and permissionless public network through DePIN and ReFi joint innovation, Arkreen empowers global communities to collectively take climate action for carbon neutrality. Join the movement towards a sustainable, interconnected future. 🌱🔗

https://medium.com/@arkreen/embracing-inclusive-climate-action-how-arkreen-is-pioneering-a-depin-refi-innovation-for-public-5b83c0fbaebe
